#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ll num,n;
		ll ans;

		ans=0;
		cin>>n;
		if(n<3)
			cout<<1<<endl;
		else
		{
			ans=ceil(log10(2*3.141592653589793*n)/2 + n*log10(n/2.7182818284590452353));
			cout<<ans<<endl;
		}

	}
return 0;
}
